full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/5/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT State of California SS Cour of Los Angeles UBHLDO HERBERA residing at 8693 1/2 GARDEN VIEW AVE., So. GATE, CA 90280 BEING FIRST DULY SWORN, DEPOSE AND SAY That I am a citizen of MEXICO born at SANTO NINO AGUANAVAL, COAH MEXICO That I am 50 years of age and have resided in the United States since MAY 11, 1955 THAT it is my intention and desire to have the following person(s) at present residing at AVE. FERROCARIL #25 OTE, TOBBEON, COAH come to the United States: Country Relationship Name Sex Age of birth to deponent VERENA HERREBA F. 62 MEXICO WIFE THAT I am employed or engaged in the business of REFRIGERATION with NATIONAL COLD STORAGE 50505 and derive a net annual Income of $24,564.00 THAT I have deposits in Banks in this country $ $ 1900.00 THAT I own Real Estate at So. GATE, CA. valued at $ 40,000.00 with mortgages or other encumbrances amounting $23,000.00 THAT I have other personal property with a reasonable value of $ 7,000.00 with encum- brances amounting $ 0 . THAT I have Life Insurance in the sum of $ $20,000.00 with cash surrender value of $ 0 THAT the following persons are dependents upon me for support: FOIA (b)(6) THAT I am willing and able to receive, maintain and support the prospective immigrants listed above. That I am ready and willing to place a bond if necessary, with the United States I Immigration authorities to guarantee that such prospective immigrant(s) will not become a public charge during his, her, their stay in the United States. THAT I have previously submitted Affidavit of Support in behalf of . I am conscious of the responsibility assumed by this Affidavit of Support and well able and willing to undertake it. Albaldo Herrera Subscribed and sworn before me this 2ND day of SEPT. 1978 Schoolor Johoo Notary Public in and for Said State OFFICIAL SEAL SALVADOR TOLEDO NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA Wolcotts Form 304 LOS ANGELES COUNTY My comm. expires DEC 14, 1980 4923 Maplewood Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90004
